featured.text: Thus, they learned how to preserve the body by drying it out, oiling and then 19 the body in linen, before placing it in the coffin.

definition.zh_def: 亞麻布，一種由亞麻植物纖維製成的布料，通常用於製作衣物和家居用品。
definition.en_def: A fabric made from the fibers of the flax plant, commonly used for clothing and household items.
definition.example: She bought a beautiful linen dress for the summer.
